name: ZX81 - Boxing Champ (2013)
description:
Boxing Champ is an addictive boxing game that blends arcade gameplay with tactical elements.

Approach your opponent and find an opening, then attack him!

Game Features:

- Available on Cassette Tape and as Digital Download
- Large range of offense and defense moves
- Internet Highscore uploading
- Online rewards
- Support for AY-sound boards
- ZXpand joystick interface support
